boxes.title: Social Media Toolkit
boxes.description: Everything you need to manage your social media presence. Includes templates, scheduling tools, and analytics dashboards.

modal.title: Social Media Toolkit Details
modal.content: Our comprehensive social media toolkit provides everything you need to succeed in your social media marketing efforts. Get access to premium templates, advanced scheduling tools, and detailed analytics dashboards.

boxes.title: Frontend Framework
boxes.description: A lightweight, responsive frontend framework for building modern web applications. Compatible with all major browsers.

boxes.title: UI Component Library
boxes.description: A comprehensive library of UI components for creating consistent, accessible interfaces. Includes dark mode support.

boxes.title: Email Campaign Manager
boxes.description: Design, schedule, and analyze your email marketing campaigns with our intuitive tools.

boxes.title: Backend API Service
boxes.description: Scalable backend service with RESTful API endpoints for your applications.

boxes.title: Dashboard Tools
boxes.description: Create custom analytics dashboards with our drag-and-drop interface. Connects to all major data sources.

boxes.title: Report Generator
boxes.description: Automatically generate beautiful, comprehensive reports from your data sources.
